website_summaries.verdict: Between its easy handling and the included accessories, this is a great option for those just getting into kayaking.
pros: Comes with a wide array of extras: paddle, plugs, storage inserts, and rod holders
Easy to get in and out of the water
cons: Some buyers found this kayak to be a little too small
Seat is on the hard and uncomfortable side

customer_reviews.title: perfect Condition, I went to fish with it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Omg 101% satisfaction , 5 days to be in my house , arrived in a 45 feet truck , perfect Condition , I went to fish with it in a bay with waves and wind no no problem , I'm just so happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 😘👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this kayak! It is very comfortable, easily maneuvered, and stable. My dog's first trip in a kayak was enjoyable for us both because the kayak did not wobble in his first nervous minutes. The Skipjack 90 is an excellent value for the money. con: it cannot be transported on a standard carrier because of the keel, but problem easier solved with a cradle carrier. Many kayakers would probably be able to carry this 46-lb. kayak short distances; but being 5'8" and 114 lbs. (and 69 years old) the width of the kayak made it too unweildy for me to manage alone.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Maier

customer_reviews.title: Good fishing platform - lousy seat
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and have been on Lake Mead a half dozen times. Love the kayak - hate the seat. Really, the seat that comes with it is worthless. The plastic buckles that keep the seat in adjustment do no hold, for a very frustrating experience constantly readjusting the buckles. We were interested in the Hero Seat offered by Vibe for $99 but it appears to have the same buckles, and if so, it is probably worthless also. There are kayak seats offered by other manufacturers that at least offer an alternative to the low quality offering by Vibe.
customer_reviews.author: ProfessorB

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent fishing platform
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6th kayak my family has purchased - our first Vibe. I bought it based on its advertised length, weight and stability. The Skipjack 90 out performs all other kayaks we won, from our light inflatable to our 86 pound 13' footer. It is an excellent fishing platform.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and a good kayak
customer_reviews.text: my headline says it all. Kayak as described and very sturdy in the water. My brother in law got caught in a storm and it was steady and handled well
customer_reviews.author: Mary Costello

customer_reviews.title: But I am very happy with the new Yak
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years with a sit inside, this was a big change. From 13' down to 9'. But I am very happy with the new Yak. Tracks well for a short boat and is faster than I expected. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jmac

customer_reviews.title: Very high qaulity.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very stable. I’m 6’3” and 200lbs. I’m a little top heavy for some kayaks. The hatches and rod holders are very convenient. I like the way the hatches fasten tightly. The liners inside the storage areas don’t stay in place very well, but that is really a trivial issue. The paddles are a lot more curved than my other paddles. So far I don’t like them, but I think my poor paddling technique is to blame. They are just different. I’m planning to add a sail kit from Falcon Sails. Falcon says this kayak works good with their sail kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kww

customer_reviews.title: Loving it, but with a flaw... [Updated]
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a blast fishing local lakes. Light weight, decent tracking, and stability are its strong suits. My only issue was yesterday when I was unlatching the paddle for storage. I heard a "ping" and the metal parts that connect both sides of the paddle were laying on the ground. Writing this review as well as a letter to Vibe to let others be aware and hopefully have this covered by warranty. UPDATE: Vibe responded on a Sunday within 30 min of me writing them. I had a new paddle shipped by 2:00 the next day, no charge. I changed my review from 3-Stars to 5 and wholly recommend this company for their amazing customer service and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: She's a beauty of form and funtion
customer_reviews.text: This is my first kayak. A lot of research and review reading went into this purchase. WINNER with the Skipjack 90. It's a little bulky to handle loading/unloading myself, not the weight, but that's what makes her stable on the water so I manage. For reference I'm 5'6", 126lbs. Once the seat is adjusted I found it comfortable for 2 hours on the water. She tracked perfectly! Loved the paddle, I adjusted it since I am left dominant for optimal stoke. All the little extras on the Skipjack were nice perks. Happy happy happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Did not know if my wife would like it or not
customer_reviews.text: Did not know if my wife would like it or not, but to play it safe I let her pick the colors. After 1 hour of her in it, I realized that if I wanted to have a yak of my own, it was not going to be this one, so my Vibe Sea Ghost arrived yesterday and we had them out today. Fantastic kayaks, and we very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: mike palermo jr.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken this bad boy out on the lake three times already in the three weeks I’ve had it. Zero complaints (other than thinking I was strong enough to carry this downstairs and strap it onto my car by myself haha). There’s more than enough storage space in the front and back. Love it, super pumped I made this purchase. A friend who has rented a kayak each time we’ve ventured out has just ordered the exact same one.
customer_reviews.author: Jasa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered and it arrived pretty quickly. I have already taken it out on the river and I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: kira

customer_reviews.title: Great starting fishing kayak!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely phenomenal. Very stable and light weight, also comes with the paddle. What I really like the most about this kayak is IT FITS IN MY CAR!! Yes, INSIDE my highlander (well you just have to adjust seats a bit). I don't have to worry about tieing it on top of the car and drive highway is huge. Of course, the down side is it is smaller in size, so big guys may be a bit uncomfortable. Also it doesn't have a very comfortable seat, but unless you have a back problems, it shouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: YUMIKO SAITO

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.text: This kayak tracks great. Is smooth and easy to guide. Like the pole holders as well as the other accessories, like deluxe seat, dry wells, and seat pack. This is my second kayak. It has been 15 years since my first; this one made me feel like it was only yesterday. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Darkwlkr

customer_reviews.title: Sellers were amazing. Great price for a great vessel
customer_reviews.text: Weather is just getting to where I can take it for a spin but anticipate more positive vibes from the experience. Sellers were amazing. Great price for a great vessel. Colours pop and the hull shape leads me to believe it will track amazingly. Can't touch it for the price or quality at any local sports store and a slight imperfection, not affecting function, was handled by sellers without asking. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: K. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kayak. The price is right and it comes with a dry box and rod holders. It’s VERY stable and tracks well. Comes with paddle.
customer_reviews.author: WahooMan

customer_reviews.title: My first Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and headed to the lake. I stayed dry without using scupper plugs until the wind picked up and it started getting a little choppy, I was surprised by that. Tracks decently but the nobs for your feet rest are practically useless. I'm 6'1" and my feet almost reach far enough to not use the nobs. I'm going to build some type of block that I can rest my feet on so I can paddle more efficiently. Used the paddle tie downs while casting a bit and those came in handy. Well pleased with the build quality, and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ryals

customer_reviews.title: A good kayak, shipping damage hurts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken hatch handle. Seller was quick to send an OEM replacement but it lacks the quality of the original and holes do not line up well. The kayak is well made and after 3 uses I am pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yohan

customer_reviews.title: vube skipjack kayak
customer_reviews.text: This kayak was just what I expected. we have a tandem vibe and really like it. This short version fits what we needed as well. It is equipped with everything I wanted in a single kayak. Tracking is so so but I think the shorter the kayak the worse that can get. Overall, very satisfied and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C

customer_reviews.title: Just feels like a high quality Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Have taken this out two or three times now, and it's just a treat. Well balanced, has little resistance through the water. Everything on it seems pretty high quality. I bottomed out, and got a pretty deep scrape on the bottom. But there's still plenty to go before there'd be a hole. Seems like it can take quite a beating. The drawback being it's pretty heavy. One person can carry it, awkwardly. You're gonna want a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Winebrenner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and sturdy. Husband and I have to load it together on our SUV due to the weight of it but overall very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Love the stability
customer_reviews.text: The skipjack was my first kayak. I had done all the reviews before purchasing. I loved the size and weight of it. We took it out the next day and it was like I was made for it. I was able to maneuver effortlessly and with the stability I was looking for. I no issues getting in or out. I absolutely love this kayak. Team blue
customer_reviews.author: cecilia smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I love my little kayak! I can carry it on my own, the seat is actually not uncomfortable at all. I am a beginner and have no issues with stability or steering. Great little boat!
customer_reviews.author: tajia

customer_reviews.title: Have fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife she loves it. It comes with a paddle but you will want to upgrade it and keep the one that comes with it as a spare. It is very stable for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: robert b. stowell

customer_reviews.title: Nice kayake seat sucks
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but the seat sucks it's not real comfortable after about an hour or less and one of the strapes broke for the back rest on one of my first trips. But besides the seat it's an awesome kayake easy to paddle and very stable hard to flip and fits all my gear. Rod holders are not the best but they do their job. Easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: David Sena

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Kayak. Sturdy, yet light and easy and fun to use..
customer_reviews.author: no-nonsense-techreview

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great yak and great customer service. Im 6'2" 200 and I fit perfect. A Nash 23 sub z cooler(found on amazon too) fits in the back like it was made for it. Tracks well and is very stable for a short platform.
customer_reviews.author: Will S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm really enjoying this boat. I'm able to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this boat. I'm able to get it up on the car roof and onto the foam pads. It's fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: kathy Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Inspect after shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The boat is very lightweight, easy to manage and easy to float. My boat arrived with a puncture on the rear side from shipping so be vigilant looking at the integrity of the boat. The seat bottom is lacking in cushion but that can be remedied. The built in dry bag is SO handy and effective!
customer_reviews.author: Bart Overall

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Took out on the water for the first time...cut easily thru the water...paddle was easy to use and put together. Watched video online how to set up seat...took under 5 min. nice look to it as well. Looking forward to trying it fishing next...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Boose

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kayak for the price! I love all the compartments and size. We river kayak and fish. It’s perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Pait

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better seat
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looking for accessories for it and finding its limited and definitely upgrading the seat as the back constantly slips back and have to readjust it
customer_reviews.author: Audrey craft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner kayak and fits in the back of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beginner kayak and fits in the back of my 2004 Dodge Dakota at an angle. Had to replace the seat though, as the factory seat was a bit uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very stable!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kayak. It is very stable and I was able to run through some pretty shallow water in the river I floated. I can’t wait to take it out some more.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First kayak I've ever owned and will probably be the last barring any un-fixable damage.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Price worth it
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend went on it my first time you get what you pay for perfect small kayak for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome craftsmanship. Was shipped to us wrapped in felt ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome craftsmanship. Was shipped to us wrapped in felt and bubble wrap. My son was very happy and can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and compact
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sturdiness of it. It also paddles well and has good large dry storage holes. It is a bit heavier than what I am use to though.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy DiGiacinto

customer_reviews.title: Handles well in the water, a bit of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Handles well in the water, a bit of a struggle at my age to get it from the pier to the water.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Kayak but they could explain the seat better. I had to look it up on You Tube. :(
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jazwiecki

customer_reviews.title: ... taken it out twice so far and am very happy with
customer_reviews.text: I have taken it out twice so far and am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: morgmc94

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kayak!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kayak for beginners or for the experienced kayaker. It is very stable and moves nicely through the water. I would recommend a longer paddle due to the kayak being 32 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: James Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use mine every week and love it.Very stable with lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: mark tate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was better than what I was expecting. I wasn't expecting a free paddle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But impressed with workmanship and it arrived in 100% perfect condition. I am a bit older and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to get it to the lake yet, still a bit chilly. But impressed with workmanship and it arrived in 100% perfect condition. I am a bit older and I know I cannot get this up over my head to put on top of my car myself so will have to find another way to get it to the lake. Just want to let anybody know that who is wondering. I can easily lift it into the truck of my car though. Thinking may have to get an SUV!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Small but doesn't feel like it.
customer_reviews.text: This small kayak is just perfect for me and my 40lb dog. Two dry storage cubbies are a plus. They are fairly large and perfect for all those extras you tend to throw in a dry bag. Thus frees up leg room since you have to leave the back storage for the cooler. Bonus it arrived in about 1 week so was able to get back on the water asap.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedra

customer_reviews.title: too bad, would have been happy
customer_reviews.text: kayak is great so far, seat not so much. one strap broke while putting tit together. the next one broke half hour into my first trip, a third broke while leaning back reaching into my pocket. this is supposed to be rated for 350 pounds, i weigh only 150, could only imagine what would happen if someone weighing 300 sat in this seat. my advice buy an after market seat with your purchase or buy a different kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is a amazing. Very stable
customer_reviews.text: I just came off the water with this....it is a amazing. Very stable, love the storage. Shipping was great, wrapped well.....delivered right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love My Skipjack 90
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love My Skipjack 90! Just what I was looking for! Comfortable and very stable! Cant wait till the fishing gets better! It’s a Real Beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my vibe kayak just one drawback the seat isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my vibe kayak just one drawback the seat isn't comfortable so I put a bass seat on it unfortunately it made it a little tipsy so I ordered stabilizers......with the stabilizers and bass seat it will be awesome. Thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present for my son. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich W

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again, and it is through ...
customer_reviews.text: I would buy it again , and it is through a third party which is Vibe Kayaks. But there work with you very well. There fair and try to help out FAST.
customer_reviews.author: Ken & Wendy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and free shipping can't be beat.
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves her new kayak. It's very stable and comfortable to sit in, much better quality and construction than kayaks I saw at Dick's, Academy, or Walmart. It took about a week to be delivered and came in a semi-truck well packaged and padded.
customer_reviews.author: John D Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks mint. Can't wait to get it in the water. I'm a paraplegic so the size and weight I perfect for me I can move it around myself which is huge for me. The delivery guy dragged it up my driveway, could have done without that.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Happy With My Experience.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Condition....putting in the water tomorrow so I will post something else if it turns out to sink or fill up with water. But not expecting any negative experience...it looks well made....and I am blown away with how fast I received this kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Scout  B

product_meta.title: Vibe Kayaks Skipjack 90 9 Foot Angler and Recreational Sit On Top Light Weight Fishing Kayak with Paddle and Seat and 2 Flush Rod Holders and Built in Storage
feature_bullets: KEY FEATURES | 1-person sit on top fishing kayak - 9ft 46lbs fishing kayak with Journey paddle and deluxe kayak seat that provides portability and stability in a smaller package
MOUNT FOR ACCESORIES | 4 capped flush mount rod holders and mounting point for Scotty, RAM and Vibe mount accessories
NO MORE OVERBOARD PADDLES | Two paddle parks to help secure paddles when not in use, preventing lost overboard paddles
MULTIPLE STORAGE OPTIONS | 2 sealed hatches with bag inserts and large bungeed rear tank well to protect all your kayaking necessities
EXTRA FEATURES | 4 easy-grip carry handles for transport and portability
